subject: Atmanirbhar Bharat: Relief for Contractors/ Developers of Road Sector.
text: HRav Trv TTTHrf sifeqrrut T44 , IPhone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (em 4Rart 3 {THNf ATG4) 577 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 & 6, Taer-10, EReT;, 7$ fert-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Atmanirbhar Bharat/202o Policy No. 18.57 /2020 dated the October, 2020 {Decision taken on E-Office File of CMD Comp. No. 5788} Sub:: Atmanirbhar Bharat: Relief for Contractors/ Developers of Road Sector. MoRTH vide Letter No. COVID-19/RoadMap/ JS(H)/2020 dated 06.10.2020 has issued directions regarding extending the relief measures notified in MoRTH letter no. COVID-19/RoadMap/ JS(H)/2020 dated 03.06.2020 on the subject Atmanirbhar Bharat: Relief for Contractors/ Developers of Road Sector' _ A copy of the same is attached herewith for implementation with immediate effect. 2_ The validity of policy circulars of NHAI on above matters will now be as per above letter dated 06.10.2020 of MoRTH. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl. Letter dt. 06.10.2020 of MoRTH 3 & (Digvijay Mishra) Chief General Manager (Coord.) All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. AlI Members/ CVO 2. PS to Chairman 3 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 4. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 5 Web Admin for circulation. RWT M" NHAI 15th To, Copy
